title: Neo-Nazi Thomas Sewell arrested outside Melbourne court hours after confronting Victorian premier at press conference
summary: Sewell was arrested following an attack by neo-Nazis on Camp Sovereignty, a site for Indigenous protests. The incident occurred on a Sunday, resulting in increased tensions in the area. Authorities are addressing the situation and investigating the motivations behind the attack.

title: Borderline review – Raymond Nicholson shines as a deranged fan in comedy thriller
summary: In the 1990s, a pop star becomes a hostage of an obsessed fan in Jimmy Warden's film, which draws inspiration from a real-life stalking case involving Madonna. The movie blends stylish elements with a confused narrative. It explores themes of celebrity obsession and the darker side of fame.

title: The Hallmarked Man by Robert Galbraith review – a terrific, tightly plotted romp
summary: In the latest Cormoran Strike novel by JK Rowling, four murder investigations keep the pace brisk and engaging. The story diverges from the slower elements of previous installments. Fans are left wondering if Strike will finally express his feelings for Robin.
